message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $11,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price, considering its worth to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a price of $9,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Bob, thanks for your counter-offer.  I understand your position, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $10,000? I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment at that price.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I would like to propose a price of $9,500 for it. I hope this aligns better with your valuation of the item.
